name: liminfresuz2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsi, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsi, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cz))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsi, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cz))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cz))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cdm(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cz))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsi, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cdm(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cz))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cdm(c0)))
-| wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cdm(c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → dom((c0 |` ℝ))⊆ dom(c0))
⊣ dom((c0 |` ℝ))⊆ dom(c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsi, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cz))
-| wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cdm(c0))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsi, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cz))

comment: If the domain of a function is a subset of the integers, the inferior limit doesn't change when the function is restricted to an upper set of integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
